title: Champ select search
body: You shoudl be able to search up roles(not lanes) and will show you allt hose champs for example marksman, support and other roles

replies.body:
problem with that is, nobody would supp...
how about this idea?
You queue for a ranked game, lowest mmr player from each team is forced into the supp role, the 4 other players on each team are asked what are their 2 or 3 most preferred roles on a scale of 1 to 3, 1 their best 3 their not so good but playable, off of that you are administered a role for that game. 

Please note the people which were going to be forced into the supp role, will not be if one of the players puts supp as their #1 or #2 preferred role.
I'm pretty sure he means you should be able to type a role into the search box and champs tagged with that role show up for selection while in champ select.
